name: In which Direction
description:
With the help of a friend, find the key to the maze and escape before the sentinel catches any one of you. Use the periscopes scattered throughout the map to watch from atop to guide your partner; and the trees as markers to know where you are. 

Controls:

Player 1 (left screen): WS for movement, AD to control camera & to interact collide with the object

Player 2 (right screen): 🡡 🡣 for movement, 🡠 🡢 to control camera & to interact collide with the object

Both players can hit the ket 'H' to drop the key to the maze to avoid death.

PS: watch your back :)
